parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
The conscience, a persisting notion. From a prolonged form of suneido; co-perception, i.e. Moral consciousness.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Feminine Singular
Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Or apothomai ap-o'-thom-ahee from apo and the middle voice of otheo or otho; to push off, figuratively, to reject.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From a compound of naus and ago; to be shipwrecked, literally or figuratively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
